part.Name: Description
part.Short: Light peaks through its wet leaves in scattershot, and its roots look like a wax colonnade melted into a maze and resolidified.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Light peaks through its wet leaves in scattershot, and its roots look like a wax colonnade melted into a maze and resolidified.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fruited hands climb the stalks of the grifter tree. When the light catches on the surface of the exposed corm, Spindle glitter throws it back to the widened grove.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A tangled nest of roots spill through the earth. The bark is splintered into pointy spines. The leaves are greasy and stinking.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A tangled nest of roots spill through the earth. The bark is splintered into pointy spines.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A particularly prickly peano patch.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Starapples hang from ashen branches, motes of luscious, red light in a bleached tableau.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Starapples hang from ashen branches, motes of luscious, red light in a bleached tableau.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Golden fronds unfurl when the desert wind moistens. Pieces of bark, collated into tiny intersecting rings, have been chewed off by wood grazers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Skin peels on the tuber belly as it hums with grounding bass, and the shoots throb in upsetting staccato.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright florets explode from a central disc of darker, spiraling florets. Together they're like a tiny sun.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hut's girth of bug-gnawed bark shoots up into ethereal sky and splays into a crown of foliage.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Insects circle and buzz around a quartet of golden brown petals that droop over their thickling stalk. When something touches it, the floret lashes up in a dreamful rage.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Coral petals sprout from the top of a flimsy stem. A metal or bone hoof has crushed its siblings and spread their acid fibers across the soil.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Salt gathers in its furrows. It's knotted with moisture-swollen wafers in place of leaves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Salt gathers in its furrows. It's knotted with moisture-swollen wafers in place of leaves, and it appears to be half-eaten.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Girthy pilings of fibrous salt-rot stake out these pools of brine. They belong to no one.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A nebula of spaded leaves swish with dry creek and beetle munch.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A nebula of spaded leaves swish with dry creek and beetle munch.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The trunk column corkscrews on the radial path of light and blossoms a crown of victory laurel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The trunk column corkscrews on the radial path of light and blossoms a crown of victory laurel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sun-sated fronds sag against a bug-scarred trunk in the shape of a melted star.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The strands glisten with a frothing film.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's achromous and brittle; it crunches under the foot. How it clusters into mats must conform to the shape of life-wet body-banks it once flowered from, and with dark red blood will again.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ghost-canes are twirled to pictorial stillness, and moisture gathers on their buds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Puffy halos of acid and myrtle green leaves gird the length of a sky-toward wood minaret. The peak breaks out the canopy to win the sun-drinking game.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Moss-slick shoots coil at the crown of a slouching trunk like the she-medusa. Air musses them into more disarray.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Through the nether of a vaulted root-trellis, leaves point at perfect angles to sift sunlight and bathe ur-buds in soft gold warmth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright sequin leaves shimmer in indigo constellations, and branches fork through the entropy fungus.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bent roots chunnel upward to a canopy of fuzz. The eye tries to draw a boundary around single leaves, but their light lines sputter and lose their derivatives.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Waxen sprigs sag to the weight of the algebraic tubers. Each one is perfect and regular, its faces matte with sheenless platonic dew.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Real potential surfs the rhizome on choppy waves and quantizes into woody blades of grass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bubbles of green stipules are arrayed in rings of quickening lattice growth. The pace is sorcerous; the earnest and everforward will of the plantworld is captured here at a millionfold.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its aspect imbued with lucent coral, this mushroom catches your eye like no other. Qud knows no such hue, and so you ask =player.reflexive=: what sort of radiant rain dyed its flesh? Could it be an iota of the Eaters themselves, mummified in the soil of the Rainbow Wood?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shining hyphae pour their soft light up into the orbicular cap of the earthlamp.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its stalk is trunk-fat, and powder coats the spots on its humongous cap. The pigment of its skin is liquid dye from a nearby weep.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nature bequeathed a dandy cap to the slender, bowed stalk and gills that pucker on its underside. The pigment of its skin is liquid dye from a nearby weep.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fairy rings of braided grass-coral-fungi hybrids poke along their shadow network and excrete replicated struts as sheathing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Stuck to the feelers of a polyp cluster and beetling from a corroded strut is a swollen lump of film. A bright broth of carbon-melted platinum goo burns inside.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Feelers sway in a circlet on a skeletal vase-column. The aboral side is yoked to other polyps, forming a fossilized arcology.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bow polyps colonize the cylindrical topology of the lattice and pattern out an orthogonal neighborhood in a network of life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soft-body beings excrete the calcified walls of their arcologies as air-climbing spires. They have stone texture and house microlife in their cavities.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cry-packed casing freckles on cyclinders joined at right angles. Shine from the softer metal pokes through, silvery-white palladium that once performed hydro- and electroconduction across a vast arcological lattice.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Porous skeletons of spongin poke the inverted tunnel buttes, stone-like, out to angles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's laminated jelly molded as a globoid with pores to filter and nosh algae, and it jiggles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Stalactitic prisms stutter-hum the compressed thoughtstuff of trillions across the psychic sea.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Microcolumns of incandescent crystal are bundled in dense posies, and branch through the sky as magnificent fractals. They toss moonlight back and forth between them.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Drops of static dew fuzz the sharp crystal edges. The flats themselves are radiant and rustle on a psychic breeze. In gestalt, they flow like reversible sequins across the mind/body divide.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Drops of static dew fuzz the sharp crystal edges. The flats themselves are radiant and rustle on a psychic breeze. In gestalt, they flow like reversible sequins across the mind/body divide.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its corners were waxed off by static and its crystal corms burn with tranduced moonlight. It chimes in near and far keys.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its corners were waxed off by static and its crystal corms burn with tranduced moonlight. It chimes in near and far keys.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Little crystal shoots were crushed by pure ego-weight to a girthful, stout, and equant tranducer of transient thoughtsoft. Decohered emotion and memory crystallize as they shoot up the root.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hexagon fibers of delicate crystal twine through the earth and push the ambient psychal glow up the phloem to the sapient chimes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hexagon fibers of delicate, newly shedded crystal twine through the earth and vibrate with pre-psychal fullness. They radiate an early glow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Heartroots tangle at the yawning psychal nexus of the crystal tree. They burn with the light of gaseous feelstuff, all the bits of ambient order in the soil and rock animated by a deeper dimensional warping. This is a shore on the psychic sea.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A squadron of flowstone limbs grip the cave floor, and a banded trunk of calcite pokes the rotting air. Its twirling apex is wrapped in bone-made-vapor.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Coral bricks tesselate the path toward an otherplace.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Black marble rectangles tesselate the path.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Brick rectangles tesselate the path.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metal rectangles tesselate the path.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Brick rectangles tesselate the path.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Marble rectangles tesselate the path.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Black marble rectangles tesselate the path.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Grey marble rectangles tesselate the path.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bridge made of dried brinestalk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dappled marble rectangles are stepping stones in and out of the pit.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glistening silk was spun to a capture spiral and mounted on a series of bridge threads.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glistening silk was spun to a capture spiral and mounted on a series of bridge threads. Hoarfrost fractals texture the strands outside the 2D plane.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glistening silk was spun to a capture spiral and mounted on a series of bridge threads. The filament vibrates across dimensions in the manifold.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dust blooms on the ascending stair.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Light ebbs off the descending stair.

part.Name: StairsDown
part.PullMessage: You fall down the slimy shaft!

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Machinic tones are made soft against the slime-wet walls of a darkling shaft. A void is beneath.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Darkness floods up from the empty space.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Darkness floods up from the empty space.

part.Name: StairsDown
part.JumpPrompt: It looks like an awfully long fall. Are you sure you want to jump?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Space is emptied of solid impediments.

part.Name: StairsDown
part.PullMessage: You scramble down a craggy ledge.
part.JumpPrompt: It looks like an awfully long fall. Are you sure you want to jump?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Space is emptied of solid impediments.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Darkness floods up from the empty space.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A freightless tether slings down a dark and vast channel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Darkness floods up the polyp-strewn fringes of an open pit.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cleft in the red stone opens to a waterspray of underearth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Smooth and cloudy frustums hover in a helix of psionic suspension.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Smooth and cloudy frustums hover in a helix of psionic suspension.
